document_data.Relationships: During his last raid, he was in the same group as [[Shuldroon]] and [[Rondrand]].
document_data.History: Athlar was one of the [[highknight]]s that took part in the raid on [[Elminster Aumar]]'s refuge at [[Tethgard]] in the [[Hullack Forest]] after the old sage had stolen the ''[[Royal Gorget of Battle]]'', on [[Mirtul 5]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}. He was not named among the known survivors afterwards.
